The Far Side comic 2 for May 31, 2024

summary.caption: “I just can’t go in there, Bart! … Some feller in there and I are wearin’ the same kind of hat!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for May 31, 2024

summary.caption: “Well, that cat’s doing it again—keeping that poor thing alive just to play with it awhile.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for May 31, 2024

summary.caption: “Wait a minute, gentlemen. … Here’s the ‘on’ switch over here.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for May 31, 2024

summary.caption: “The white whale! The whiiiiiiite wh … no, no … my mistake! … A black whale! A regular, blaaaaaack whale!”
